title: v1.7
changelog:
Bugfix
- Fix shortcut for opening JSON from file crashing

New features
- Added shortcut for opening JSON from url
- Added editing support for JSON and exporting to file

title: v1.6.1
changelog:
New features
- Added support for loading JSON from a URL
- Clicking on the path now displays the full path

Updates
- Update UI
- Update raw JSON view
  - Enhanced performance for raw JSON rendering and syntax highlighting
  - Added pinch-to-zoom support
- Android 15 support
  - Implemented edge-to-edge support

title: v1.5
changelog:
Bugfix
- fix raw JSON view not displaying correct data
- Fix null fields not showing in raw JSON view

New features
- Add Settings page
- Expand JSON Raw View
- Added Filter
- Added Syntax Highlighter for raw JSON

Updates
- Update UI
  - update drag and drop UI
- Update about page
  - Add Feedback button

title: v1.4
changelog:
Bugfix
- fix onBackPressed crash when adapter is null
- fix path bug
- Fix support for JSON Array
- fix MIME types

New features
- Added autolink
- Added themed icon
- Added splash screen
- Added Drag and Drop feature
- Highlight previous position
- Added Crash logs page
- Added warning dialog before sharing logs
- Added Split view

Updates
- update About page
- Update loading file
- UI update
  - add start screen animation
  - loading animation update
  - Snackbar update
